name: Customa for Reddit
description: The most customizable Discord theme is now available for Reddit. Made for new layout. Customa Website; customa.github.io Userscript; Customa for Reddit (used to fix shadow for the header when scrolled to top) View open bugs in the Notes from latest update section.
additional_info:
Bugs (in order of most to least importance);
- only works on classic view mode
- not tested on subs
- some dropdowns are unstyled
